game.name: Ship of Fools - Water Garden Duo
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 바다에 새로운 Fools가 등장합니다. Water Garden Duo가 여러분과 함께할 준비를 마쳤습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: New Fools have emerged from the ponds. The Water Garden duo is ready to join your crew.
